title: @RIOT How Many Chroma Skins Will Victorious Graves Have?
body:
_So if my understanding is correct it goes like this:_

**Victorious Graves (Base Skin): Gold+ in Solo Que**
**
VG Chroma #1: Gold+ Flex Que**

**VG Chroma #2: Gold+ Twisted Treeline**

_Can anyone at Riot confirm this?_

replies.body: could you tell us what the colours could be and for what queue they are

> [{quoted}](name=Stealthzy,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2EgjGrrl,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-10-13T19:02:14.514+0000)
>
> could you tell us what the colours could be and for what queue they are

This would be nice. I don't pay TT and generally only play this game solo or duo so having to play against 3's would be really annoying. Especially if the chroma color isnt even worth it

A Rioter [confirmed on reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/74wgc3/2017_season_rewards/do1nrhd/) that it's

* Base skin: Gold+ in any queue
* Chroma 1: Gold+ in Solo/Duo SR
* Chroma 2: Gold+in Flex SR
* Chroma 3: Gold+ in Flex TT
